La-malmesure-des-mots
About Archive

About

Let me share with you my poetry. Feel free to quote my poems in using the name of this website and my name (Giacomo Ecce). The poetry that is not mine is cited explicitly. I wish you a long poetic journey.

Website created by me using the Jekyll theme pixyll and hosted freely on Github.

"Je pense à la chaleur que tisse la parole autour de son noyau le rêve qu'on appelle nous" - Tristan Tzara
